name: The Great Story of a Mighty Hero - Remastered
description: Ironic "Hack and Slash" RPG bath filled with blood and gore! Go through the wall of enemies and defeat the mighty evil to become a mighty hero!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/Vista (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Dual Core 2.0GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce or ATI card 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 14 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10/7/8/8.1/Vista (32 or 64 bit) Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660, ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 14 GB available space
